00032   class RangeState {
00033   public:
00034     enum { STEADY, SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED, SPLIT_SHRUNK };
00035     RangeState() : state(STEADY), soft_limit(0), transfer_log(0) { return; }
00036     size_t encoded_length();
00037     void encode(uint8_t **bufPtr);
00038     bool decode(uint8_t **bufPtr, size_t *remainingPtr);

00048   class RangeStateCopy : public RangeState {
00049   public:
00050     RangeStateCopy(RangeState &rs) {
00051       state = rs.state;
00052       soft_limit = rs.soft_limit;
00053       if (rs.transfer_log) {
00054         transfer_log_str = rs.transfer_log;
00055         transfer_log = transfer_log_str.c_str();
00056       }
00057       else
00058         transfer_log = 0;
00059     }
00060     RangeStateCopy(RangeStateCopy &rsc) {
00061       state = rsc.state;
00062       soft_limit = rsc.soft_limit;
00063       if (rsc.transfer_log) {
00064         transfer_log_str = rsc.transfer_log;
00065         transfer_log = transfer_log_str.c_str();
00066       }
00067       else
00068         transfer_log = 0;
00069     }
00070     void set_transfer_log(const String &tl) {
00071       transfer_log_str = tl;
00072       transfer_log = transfer_log_str.c_str();
00073     }
00074     
00075   private:
00076     String transfer_log_str;
00077   };
